fsrtool.name: fsrtool_calendar_events
fsrtool.structure: CREATE TABLE `fsrtool_calendar_events` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `title` text, `start` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `end` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `allDay` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
